titles.title: Adoption Tax Relief Guarantee Act of 2011
To repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to the expansion of the adoption credit and adoption assistance programs.
Adoption Tax Relief Guarantee Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Adoption Tax Relief Guarantee Act of 2011- Exempts provisions expanding the adoption tax credit and adoption assistance programs enacted by the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 from the general terminating (sunset) provisions of that Act.
